00049 enum _catalog_mode{
00050         GFAL_CATALOG_ALL=0,
00051         GFAL_CATALOG_ACCESS,
00052         GFAL_CATALOG_CHMOD,
00053         GFAL_CATALOG_RENAME,
00054         GFAL_CATALOG_SYMLINK,
00055         GFAL_CATALOG_STAT,
00056         GFAL_CATALOG_LSTAT,
00057         GFAL_CATALOG_MKDIR,
00058         GFAL_CATALOG_RMDIR,
00059         GFAL_CATALOG_OPENDIR, // concat of opendir readdir, closedir
00060         GFAL_CATALOG_OPEN, // concat of open read, close
00061         GFAL_CATALOG_GETSURL,
00062         GFAL_CATALOG_GETTURL,

00078 struct _gfal_catalog_interface{
00079         // handle
00080         catalog_handle handle;
00081         // to have name/id of the catalog MUST be IMPLEMENTED
00082         const char* (*getName)();
00086         void (*catalog_delete)(catalog_handle); 
00092         gboolean (*check_catalog_url)(catalog_handle, const char* url,  catalog_mode mode, GError** err);
00096         int (*accessG)(catalog_handle, const char* path, int mode, GError** err);
00100         int     (*chmodG)(catalog_handle, const char *, mode_t, GError** err);
00101         int     (*renameG)(catalog_handle, const char *, const char *, GError** err);
00102         int (*symlinkG)(catalog_handle, const char*, const char*, GError** err);
00103         int (*statG)(catalog_handle, const char*, struct stat *buf, GError** err);
00104         int (*lstatG)(catalog_handle, const char*, struct stat *buf, GError** err);
00105         ssize_t (*readlinkG)(catalog_handle, const char*, char* buff, size_t buffsiz, GError** );
00106 
00107         // directory management
00108          gfal_file_handle (*opendirG)(catalog_handle, const char*, GError**); 
00109          int (*closedirG)(catalog_handle, gfal_file_handle, GError**);
00110          struct dirent* (*readdirG)(catalog_handle, gfal_file_handle, GError**);
00111         int (*mkdirpG)(catalog_handle, const char*, mode_t, gboolean pflag, GError**);  //function pointer for the mkdir call, if pflag is set, the call is considered like a recursive call for a full path creation
00112         int (*rmdirG )(catalog_handle, const char*, GError**);           
00113 
00114          // basic file operation, 
00115          gfal_file_handle (*openG)(catalog_handle, const char* path, int flag, mode_t mode, GError**);
00116          int (*readG)(catalog_handle, gfal_file_handle fd, void* buff, size_t count, GError**);
00117          int (*writeG)(catalog_handle, gfal_file_handle fd, void* buff, size_t count, GError**);
00118          int (*closeG)(catalog_handle, gfal_file_handle fd, GError **);
00119          int (*lseekG)(catalog_handle, gfal_file_handle fd, off_t offset, int whence, GError** err);
00120          
00121          // remove operations
00122          int (*unlinkG)(catalog_handle, const char* path, GError**);
00123          
00124          // advanced attributes management
00125          ssize_t (*getxattrG)(catalog_handle, const char*, const char*, void* buff, size_t s_buff, GError** err);
00126          ssize_t (*listxattrG)(catalog_handle, const char*, char* list, size_t s_list, GError** err);
00127          
00128          char** (*getSURLG)(catalog_handle, const char*, GError**);      
00129          int (*getTURLG)(catalog_handle, const char* surl, char* buff_turl, int size_turl, char** reqtoken, GError** err);
00130          int (*putTURLG)(catalog_handle, const char* surl, char* buff_turl, int size_turl, char** reqtoken, GError** err);
00131         
00132 };
